author: Vinhunter666
comment: I think not so early , maybe next year, but try to find part time jobs related to what you are learning. Cos most companies won't hire y1 students because or age and other factors, moreover , since u are applying without school,  so you will have to compete with uni students that also want to intern at that company.

author: iamnothingbuta
comment: 3 HACKATHONS? I am Y2 and have never been to hackathon until y2, i think you are doing fine, just grind seal points
